revised_title: Investigating Secondary Deflections in Magnetized Needles Due to Unequal Distribution of Magnetism
tldr: The author examines the secondary deflections in magnetized needles when placed near an iron shell, due to an unequal distribution of magnetism in its two branches. The study reveals that the deflections are influenced by the position of the needle and the iron shell, and provides insights into the distribution of magnetism and the underlying principles of magnetism.
